RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BILLAL chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch in closest aim of the leader, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command nearing the eighth pole, edged clear under a drive and was geared down in the final jumps to the finish. RIDGEWOOD RUNNER coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared near the eighth pole, ran on to preserve the place honors clear of the rest. SPEED RUNNER coaxed from the start, chased four then three wide before briefly tucking to the two path half a mile from home and then making his way to the inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and kept on one paced to the finish. LAMBETH five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked briefly three wide before taking to the two path through the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch and weakened. LE VIN chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Ridgewood Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 3-2w, coaxed near 1/4, 4w uppr, caught, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Speed Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, to 2p 1/2, ins turn, 3w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Billal
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed near 1/4, 5w upper, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Lambeth
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, to 3p 1/2, 2p turn, 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Le Vin
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 4w turn, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Clai m Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIAMOND COLLECTOR chased four wide, was in behind a trio disputing the pace through the turn when placed to coaxing at the three-eighths, tipped five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command near the sixteenth marker, then shook away in the late stages. GUARDIAN ANGEL three wide in aim of the leader, advanced in tandem with BABY SOX to vie for the front through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths and taking command five-sixteenths from home, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in under lone threat and was collared a sixteenth out, fought on and was shaken off in the last jumps while well clear of the rest and along second best. RITAAN coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and improved position to procure the show honors. BABY SOX coaxed from the start, raced just off the inside in aim of the leader before advancing to vie between foes through the turn under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. LONDON LADY chased along the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. RACHEL CAROLINE six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path through the turn getting placed to coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and made no impact. SERENADE SOLDIER coaxed along the inside showing the way down the backstretch, got joined by a pair of rivals and vied inside of them through the turn yielding the front with five-sixteenths to go, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: London Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 2p 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Ritaan
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4-5w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Sox
ENTRY.OWNER: Tanzman David Speranza Steven Hablan Los Caballos LLC and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 2p in aim, vied betw turn, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Rachel Caroline
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 2p turn, coaxed 7/16, 4-5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Diamond Collector
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, up near 1/16, inched away

ENTRY.NAME: Serenade Soldier
ENTRY.OWNER: McGuire Matthew T Hoover Michael L Rulapaugh Jr Terry Wayne and McGuire James Wa
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed along ins, vied w/ pair turn, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Guardian Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w in aim, vied 3w turn, up 5/16, 4w upper, collared, fought on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Beldame S. - Grade2 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 104. Stakes Purse 250000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $250 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,250 to pass the entry box and an additio nal $1,250 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $1,250 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided as follows: $137,500 to the o wner of the winner, $50,000 to second, $30,000 to third, $15,000 to fourth, $10,000 to fifth and $7,500 divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight for age. Three-year-olds. 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Mrs. John E. Cowdin has donated a perpetual cup to be held by the owner of the winner for one year. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, September 23, 2023 with 16 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RANDOMIZED rated just off the inside showing the way through sensible splits, had RIDING PRETTY briefly latch on at the three-eighths and remained patiently handled, swung four wide into upper stretch, came under light hand urging at the three-sixteenths and edged clear under a light hand ride, then got taken back in hand inside the final seventy yards prevailing comfortably on the wire. A MO REAY stumbled at the start, was under a rating hold tracking the leader along the inside, got let out spinning two to three wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while fully extended to secure the place honors clear of the rest. NOSTALGIC three wide through the first turn, chased three then two wide coming under a drive at the seven-sixteenths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, came up empty. RIDING PRETTY just off the inside at the tail of the field early on, tipped four wide at the nine-sixteenths and advanced on the front bidding three to four wide to briefly latch on the leader at the three-eighths, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths and swung five wide at the head of the lane, then weakened in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Riding Pretty
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, tip 4w advanced 9/16, 3-4w turn, 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: A Mo Reay
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, rated ins, 2-3w uppr, no match, fully extended

ENTRY.NAME: Randomized
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 2p, 4w upper, light urging 3/16, edged clr, handily

ENTRY.NAME: Nostalgic
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, chased 3-2w, urged 7/16, 5-6w upper, empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; O lder, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIKUM five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied to split foes a furlong out taking command a sixteenth from home, then gamely fended off a rival to prevail on the wire. QUEENS MASTERPIECE dueled from the two path with BIG BEAN CHRISTINE to her inside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive clinging to the front from a pair of foes a furlong out, got headed near the sixteenth marker and fought on to the finish. BIG BEAN CHRISTINE dueled inside of the aforementioned foe coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch, fought on inside a pair and had the rider lose the handle on the crop to the left side just outside the eighth pole, kept on to the finish to preserve the show honors. CARBON coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish. CLOVER STREET bobbled at the start, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch and offered no response. FANCYPANTS JULIANA brushed the near side stall at the start, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighth, swung five wide into upper stretch, weakened. FREDDYMO FACTOR chased three to four wide under coaxing from three furlongs out, went six wide into upper stretch, drifted out through the stretch to the finish and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Freddymo Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w uppr, drifted str, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bean Christine
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled ins, coaxed 3/8, ins 1/4, lost crop 1/8p, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Queens Masterpiece
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, dug in, headed, fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Fancypants Juliana
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Carbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Clover Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Sikum
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-6w backstretch, 2p turn, 2w 1/4p, split foes, up 1/16, gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Futurity S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 88. Stakes Purse 150000. OUTER TURF FOR TWO YEAR OLDS.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOOK'EM DANNO broke out a step at the start and was corrected, raced four then three wide in pursuit advancing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch, took over command at the three-sixteenths coming inwards, drew clear under a drive and was geared down in the late stages. WORKS FOR ME coaxed from the gate, cut the pace from the two path under pressure from JIMMYTHETOOTH to the outside, tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, got collared at the three-sixteenths and kept on to the finish. WHERE'S CHRIS coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing three furlongs out, angled five wide into upper stretch and ran on to secure the show honors. JIMMYTHETOOTH bobbled at the break, prompted the pace from the outside three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. RUDDY BUDDY stumbled badly at the start nearly belly flopping on the ground before recovering his footing, conceded four to five lengths to the front before being able to settle into stride, chased along the inside detached at the tail of the field, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch and was eased home to the finish with too much to do.

ENTRY.NAME: Where's Chris
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, ins turn, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Works for Me
ENTRY.OWNER: KatieRich Stables LLC Connors Christopher G and Appel Lawrence J
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, cut pressured pace 2p, ins turn, 2w 1/4p, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Ruddy Buddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly st, chased inside, 2w 1/4p, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Jimmythetooth
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble st, prompted 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Book'em Danno
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 4-3w pursuit, 4w uppr, up 3/16, drew clr, geared down

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Gregory J. Kilka & Bright View Farm

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 91. Claiming Purse 78000. (UP TO $13,572 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $40,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THUNDERIAN got bumped at the start by STREET SWAGG due to pressure from THE KHOZAN ONE, advanced to duel inside of KUPP with five furlongs to run, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to prevail. ALTERNATE REALITY chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled out six wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the place honors in the final jumps. KUPP coaxed from the start, led early on before being engaged in a duel while three then two wide with THUNDERIAN to his inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. THE KHOZAN ONE broke in at the start nudging STREET SWAGG into THUNDERIAN, chased five then four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to the wire. FREEDOM ROAD chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch, offered no response. STREET SWAGG lunged at the break then got bumped by THE KHOZAN ONE into THUNDERIAN, chased just off the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. DEVIL'S CAY four then three wide in pursuit, got coaxed along at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Street Swagg
ENTRY.OWNER: Anthony George Emerald Upstate Stable Roman Lawrence P CT Racing and Danzuso Alf
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunge, bumped st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Cay
ENTRY.OWNER: Anthony George Roman Lawrence P Emerald Upstate Stable CT Racing Basile Stephen
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Freedom Road
ENTRY.OWNER: Pinnacle Racing Team and Madaket Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Kupp
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, led early, dueled 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 5w uppr, wknd lte

ENTRY.NAME: Alternate Reality
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, angled 6w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Thunderian
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, dueled ins from 5/8, 2w 1/4p, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: The Khozan One
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, belatedly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Noble Damsel S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 100. Stakes Purse 150000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GERRYMANDER five wide in aim latched on to the inside of her only rival early on, took over command inside six furlongs and scampered along, tucked in one path to go four wide through the turn and shook away from the five-sixteenths into upper stretch, continued four to five wide into upper stretch and went clear going easy through to the finish. SUNSET LOUISE away to the front, showed the way six paths off the inside before being displaced from command inside six furlongs to go, tucked five wide remaining nearly latched on her sole rival to the three-eighths marker, then got steadily shaken off placed to brief urging through the latter portion of the turn, went six wide into upper stretch and proved no match for the top one while eased home.

ENTRY.NAME: Gerrymander
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w in aim, took over, 4w turn, 4-5w uppr, went clear, going easy

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Town & Country Horse Farms, LLC & Pollock Farms

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Louise
ENTRY.COMMENT: away to front, led 6w to 3/4p, 5w turn, 6w uppr, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Matron S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 81. Stakes Purse 150000. OUTER TURF FOR FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $150 each which should accompany the nomination; $750 to pass the entry box and an additional $750 to st art. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $750 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided as follows: $82,500 to the owner of the winner, $30,000 to second, $18,000 to third, $9,000 to fourth, $6,000 to fifth and $4,500 divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than maiden, claiming, starter or state-bred allowance allowed 2 lbs.; all maidens allow ed 4 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the Main Track. In the event that this race is taken off the turf, it may be subject to downgrading upon review by theG
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JODY'S PRIDE lunged at the break, chased five then four wide advancing to take command at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to prevail. TRICKY TEMPER chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, had A PRIMERA VISTA come inwards attempting to bully her way to the rail nearing the quarter pole and denied the move keeping her rightful lane before taking the inside route into upper stretch, then offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors clear of the rest while unable to threaten the top one. A PRIMERA VISTA chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, was in behind DEVIL AT MIDNIGHT and came inwards attempting to bully her way to the rail nearing the quarter pole bumping the aforementioned foe into the fence, was denied the move and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, then tipped out to the four path and weakened in the late stages while along for the show honors. SUGAR HI broke in at the start bumping LESLIE'S LOOT, chased four to five wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. LESLIE'S LOOT got bumped at the start by SUGAR HI, who broke inwards, chased two to three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and weakened. LOVE TO EAT coaxed from the start, dueled four then three wide with DEVIL AT MIDNIGHT to her inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, got displaced from the front in tandem with her main pace rival at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. DEVIL AT MIDNIGHT coaxed from the gate, dueled three then two wide with the aforementioned foe to her outside, came under coaxing when displaced from command at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in and was steadied near the eighth pole when backing away and tired. There was an objection by the trainer of A PRIMERA VISTA alleging interference against TRICKY TEMPER in the latter portion of the turn which was reviewed and dismissed prior to the result standing and the race being declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: Leslie's Loot
ENTRY.OWNER: Chapman, James K. and Tsujimoto, Stuart
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Hi
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 4-5w, coaxed 5/16, 6w uppr, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Tricky Temper
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, bumped near 1/4, ins 1/4, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: A Primera Vista
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, bumped foe near 1/4, alter out, wknd lte

ENTRY.NAME: Jody's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunge st, chased 5-4w, advanced, up 5/16, 4w upper, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Devil At Midnight
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Love to Eat
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp Staudacher David Nice Guys Stables and Hornstock Steve
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of YOR

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 45000. (UP TO $7,830 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COOLCALM COLLECTED vied between foes four then two wide taking sole command at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, held safe to prevail. SHE'S AWESOME coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three then two wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors. HARLAN'S BOND chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. TRUST THE NUMBERS broke out at the start bumping DOLCE SERA, vied five then three wide outside a pair of rivals, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. SHASI coaxed from the start, chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and offered no response. DOLCE SERA got bumped at the start by TRUST THE NUMBERS, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. ALICE KRAMDEN lunged at the start, chased two to three wide under coaxing from the half mile pole, swung four wide into upper stretch and made no impact. VIOLETS SMILE coaxed from the gate, vied three then two wide down the backstretch before tucking inside through the turn, came under urging at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Shasi
ENTRY.OWNER: Siegel Sez Stables and Shaw Ken
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no response

ENTRY.NAME: She's Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3-2w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Violets Smile
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, vied 3-2w, ins turn, urged 5/16, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Alice Kramden
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunge st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 1/2p, 4w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Coolcalm Collected
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 4-2w betw, up 3/8, 3w upper, edged away, held safe

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Crown Chase Farm LLC & Lady Prado LLC

ENTRY.OWNER: Carney Sean Donk David G and Mackay Douglas R
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, vied 5-3w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, wknd late
